channel.title: I need some help reguarding a timer

item.title: I need some help reguarding a timer
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

I want to put a timer for like 2 seconds between a sendmessage after doing a command.

Example.

    if (command.startsWith("suggest")) {
    sendMessage("Sending...");

Some kind of timer here.
sendMessage(“Thank you suggestion sent.”);

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help reguarding a timer
